DOC.detailed_description: Aim : clarify efficacy safety acupuncture patient functional dyspepsia Design : A single blind randomize control trial perform Chengdu , Hunan Chongqing province . Two hundred participant randomly assign acupuncture sham acupuncture group . Each participant receive 20 session acupuncture 4 week , duration 30 minute session . The primary outcome Patients ' global assessment efficacy 16 week inclusion . Secondary outcome include validated Leeds Dyspepsia Questionnaire , Nepean dyspepsia index , etc .
